title: Split Pea Soup
steps: Melt butter. Cook onions, celery, carrots until softened, 8-10 minutes.
Add peas, water, ham hock, bay leaves, thyme. Bring to boil.
Reduce heat, simmer partially covered until thick, about 1 hour.
Remove ham hock, shred meat, return to soup. Discard bone.
Remove bay leaves. Season with salt and pepper.
notes: No need to soak split peas.
Soup thickens significantly as it cools - thin when reheating.
